00035 Implemente_instanciable_sans_constructeur(Loi_Etat_Multi_GP_QC,"Loi_Etat_Multi_Gaz_Parfait_QC",Loi_Etat_Multi_GP_base);
00036 // XD multi_gaz_parfait_QC loi_etat_gaz_parfait_base multi_gaz_parfait_QC -1 Class for perfect gas multi-species mixtures state law used with a quasi-compressible fluid.

00038 Loi_Etat_Multi_GP_QC::Loi_Etat_Multi_GP_QC() : correction_fraction_(0),ignore_check_fraction_(0),
00039   Sc_(-1),dtol_fraction_(1.e-6) { }

00041 Sortie& Loi_Etat_Multi_GP_QC::printOn(Sortie& os) const

00047 Entree& Loi_Etat_Multi_GP_QC::readOn(Entree& is)
00048 {
00049   Param param(que_suis_je());
00050   param.ajouter("Sc",&Sc_,Param::REQUIRED); //!< XD_ADD_P double Schmidt number of the gas Sc=nu/D (D: diffusion coefficient of the mixing).
00051   param.ajouter( "Prandtl",&Pr_,Param::REQUIRED); //!< XD_ADD_P double Prandtl number of the gas Pr=mu*Cp/lambda
00052   param.ajouter( "Cp",&Cp_); //!< XD_ADD_P double Specific heat at constant pressure of the gas Cp.
00053   param.ajouter( "dtol_fraction",&dtol_fraction_); //!< XD_ADD_P double Delta tolerance on mass fractions for check testing (default value 1.e-6).
00054   param.ajouter_flag( "correction_fraction",&correction_fraction_); //!< XD_ADD_P flag To force mass fractions between 0. and 1.
00055   param.ajouter_flag( "ignore_check_fraction",&ignore_check_fraction_); //!< XD_ADD_P flag Not to check if mass fractions between 0. and 1.
00056   param.lire_avec_accolades_depuis(is);
00057   return is;
00058 }

00094 //! Calcule la masse molaire du melange (M)<br>M depend de la mase molaire de chaque espece et de la composition du melange (Yi)
00095 void Loi_Etat_Multi_GP_QC::calculer_masse_molaire(DoubleTab& tab_masse_mol_mel) const
00096 {
00097   const int size = tab_masse_mol_mel.size();
00098   ArrOfDouble inv_M(size), numer_M(size);
00099 
00100   for (int i=0; i<liste_Y.size(); i++)
00101     {
00102       double M_i=liste_especes(i).valeur().masse_molaire();
00103       const DoubleTab& Y_i=liste_Y(i).valeur().valeurs();
00104       double min_Y_i=local_min_vect(Y_i);
00105       double max_Y_i=local_max_vect(Y_i);
00106       if ((min_Y_i<0.-dtol_fraction_)||(max_Y_i>1.+dtol_fraction_))
00107         {
00108           Cerr << "Warning : (min_Y_i<-" << dtol_fraction_ << ")||(max_Y_i>1+" << dtol_fraction_ <<") for the " << i << "th mass fraction:" << finl;
00109           Cerr << "  min_Y_i = " << min_Y_i << finl;
00110           Cerr << "  max_Y_i = " << max_Y_i << finl;
00111           if (!ignore_check_fraction_) Process::exit();
00112         }
00113       for (int elem=0; elem<size; elem++)
00114         {
00115           numer_M(elem) += Y_i(elem,0);
00116           inv_M(elem) += Y_i(elem,0)/M_i;
00117         }
00118     }
00119 
00120   assert(liste_Y(0).valeur().valeurs().size()==size);
00121 
00122   for (int elem=0; elem<size; elem++)
00123     if (inv_M(elem)>1.e-8)
00124       tab_masse_mol_mel(elem,0) = numer_M(elem) / inv_M(elem);
00125 }

00141 //! Calcule le Cp du melange<br>Le Cp depend du Cp de chaque espece et de la composition du melange (Yi)
00142 void Loi_Etat_Multi_GP_QC::calculer_tab_Cp(DoubleTab& tab_Cp) const
00143 {
00144 // FIXME : Actuellement on suppose que Cp est pris constant pour chacune des especes
00145   tab_Cp=0;
00146   for (int i=0; i<liste_Y.size(); i++)
00147     {
00148       const DoubleTab& Y_i=liste_Y(i).valeur().valeurs();
00149       const double& cp_i=liste_especes(i).valeur().capacite_calorifique().valeurs()(0,0);
00150       assert(cp_i>0);
00151       for (int elem=0; elem<Y_i.size(); elem++) tab_Cp(elem,0) += Y_i(elem,0)*cp_i;
00152     }
00153 }

00169 //! Corrections explicites pour les fractions massiques pour forcer<br>la somme a 1 et sans valeurs negatives
00170 void Loi_Etat_Multi_GP_QC::rabot(int futur)
00171 {
00172   DoubleTab test( liste_Y(0).valeur().valeurs()) ;
00173   test=0;
00174 
00175   for (int i=0; i<liste_Y.size(); i++)
00176     {
00177       DoubleTab& Y_i=liste_Y(i).valeur().futur(futur);
00178       double min_Y_i=local_min_vect(Y_i);
00179       double max_Y_i=local_max_vect(Y_i);
00180       Cerr << "Verification of the " << i << "th mass fraction:" << finl;
00181       Cerr << "  min_Y_i = " << min_Y_i << finl;
00182       Cerr << "  max_Y_i = " << max_Y_i << finl;
00183       if ((min_Y_i<0.-dtol_fraction_)||(max_Y_i>1.+dtol_fraction_))
00184         {
00185           Cerr << "  Warning : (min_Y_i<-" << dtol_fraction_ << ")||(max_Y_i>1+" << dtol_fraction_ <<")" << finl;
00186           if (!ignore_check_fraction_) Process::exit();
00187         }
00188       for (int elem=0; elem<Y_i.size(); elem++)
00189         {
00190           if (Y_i(elem,0)<0.)
00191             {
00192               Y_i(elem,0)=0.;
00193               Cerr << "  Y_i forced to " << Y_i(elem,0) << " on node " << elem << finl;
00194             }
00195           if (Y_i(elem,0)>1.)
00196             {
00197               Y_i(elem,0)=1.;
00198               Cerr << "  Y_i forced to " << Y_i(elem,0) << " on node " << elem << finl;
00199             }
00200         }
00201       test+=Y_i;
00202     }
00203   double min_s=mp_min_vect(test);
00204   double max_s=mp_max_vect(test);
00205   Cerr << "Verification of the sum of the mass fractions:" << finl;
00206   Cerr << "  Sum(min_Y_i) =  " << min_s << finl;
00207   Cerr << "  Sum(max_Y_i) =  " << max_s << finl;
00208   for (int i=0; i<liste_Y.size(); i++)
00209     {
00210       DoubleTab& Y_i=liste_Y(i).valeur().futur(futur);
00211       for (int elem=0; elem<Y_i.size(); elem++) Y_i(elem,0)/=(test(elem)+DMINFLOAT);
00212     }
00213   if ((!est_egal(min_s,1.,dtol_fraction_))||(!est_egal(max_s,1.,dtol_fraction_)))
00214     {
00215       Cerr << "  Warning: the sum of the mass fractions is not equal to 1." <<finl;
00216       if (!ignore_check_fraction_) Process::exit();
00217     }
00218 }

00233 //! Recalcule la masse volumique
00234 void Loi_Etat_Multi_GP_QC::calculer_masse_volumique()
00235 {
00236   const DoubleTab& tab_ICh = le_fluide->inco_chaleur().valeurs();
00237   DoubleTab& tab_rho = le_fluide->masse_volumique().valeurs();
00238 
00239   if (correction_fraction_) rabot(0);
00240 
00241   Loi_Etat_Multi_GP_base::calculer_masse_molaire();
00242 
00243   double Pth = le_fluide->pression_th();
00244   int n = tab_rho.size();
00245   for (int som=0 ; som<n ; som++)
00246     {
00247       double r = 8.3143 / masse_mol_mel(som);
00248       tab_rho_np1(som) = calculer_masse_volumique(Pth,tab_ICh(som,0),r);
00249       tab_rho(som,0) = 0.5 * ( tab_rho_n(som) + tab_rho_np1(som) );
00250     }
00251   const Champ_base& rho_m=le_fluide->get_champ("rho_gaz");
00252   ref_cast_non_const(DoubleTab,rho_m.valeurs())=tab_rho_np1;
00253   tab_rho.echange_espace_virtuel();
00254   tab_rho_np1.echange_espace_virtuel();
00255   le_fluide->calculer_rho_face(tab_rho_np1);
00256   Debog::verifier("Loi_Etat_Multi_GP_QC::calculer_masse_volumique, tab_rho_np1",tab_rho_np1);
00257   Debog::verifier("Loi_Etat_Multi_GP_QC::calculer_masse_volumique, tab_rho",tab_rho);
00258 }
00259 
00260 double Loi_Etat_Multi_GP_QC::calculer_masse_volumique(double P, double T, double r) const
00261 {
00262   return Loi_Etat_Multi_GP_base::calculer_masse_volumique(P,T,r);
00263 }

00283 //! Calcule la viscosite dynamique de reference (depend des Yi)
00284 void Loi_Etat_Multi_GP_QC::calculer_mu_wilke()
00285 {
00286 // With Wilke formulation: https://aip.scitation.org/doi/pdf/10.1063/1.1747673
00287   const int size = liste_Y(0).valeur().valeurs().size(), list_size = liste_Y.size();
00288   DoubleTab phi(size);
00289   DoubleTab mu(size);
00290   mu = 0.;
00291   phi = 0.;
00292 
00293   for (int i=0; i<list_size; i++)
00294     {
00295       phi = 0.;
00296       double& M_i=liste_especes(i).valeur().masse_molaire();
00297       double mu_i=liste_especes(i).valeur().viscosite_dynamique().valeurs()(0,0);
00298       for (int j=0; j<list_size; j++)
00299         if (j!=i)
00300           {
00301             double& M_j=liste_especes(j).valeur().masse_molaire();
00302             double mu_j=liste_especes(j).valeur().viscosite_dynamique().valeurs()(0,0);
00303             double a=1.+sqrt(mu_i/mu_j)*pow(M_j/M_i,0.25);
00304             double b=sqrt(8.*(1.+(M_i/M_j)));
00305             /*
00306              * E Saikali : XXX XXX XXX
00307              * I think that a term is missing in this formulation
00308              * (phi_ij must be multiplied by Mi/Mj since we use mass fractions and not mol fractions !)
00309              */
00310             double phi_ij=a*a/b;
00311 
00312             const DoubleVect& y_j = liste_Y(j).valeur().valeurs();
00313 // node is elem (VDF) or face (VEF)
00314             for (int node=0; node<y_j.size(); node++) phi(node) += y_j(node)*phi_ij;
00315           }
00316 // We add the mass fraction when i = j
00317       const DoubleVect& y_i = liste_Y(i).valeur().valeurs();
00318       for (int node=0; node<y_i.size(); node++) mu(node) += mu_i * y_i(node)/ ( y_i(node) + phi(node) );
00319     }
00320   calculer_tab_mu(mu, size);
00321 }
00322

00336 //! Calcule la viscosite dynamique sur Schmidt
00337 void Loi_Etat_Multi_GP_QC::calculer_mu_sur_Sc()
00338 {
00339   const Champ_Don& mu = le_fluide->viscosite_dynamique();
00340   const DoubleTab& tab_mu = mu.valeurs();
00341   Champ_Don& mu_sur_Sc = le_fluide->mu_sur_Schmidt();
00342   DoubleTab& tab_mu_sur_Sc = mu_sur_Sc.valeurs();
00343 
00344   if (!sub_type(Champ_Uniforme,mu_sur_Sc.valeur()))
00345     {
00346       const int n = tab_mu_sur_Sc.size();
00347       if (sub_type(Champ_Uniforme,mu.valeur()))
00348         for (int i=0 ; i<n ; i++) tab_mu_sur_Sc(i,0) = tab_mu(0,0) / Sc_;
00349       else
00350         for (int i=0 ; i<n ; i++) tab_mu_sur_Sc(i,0) = tab_mu(i,0)/Sc_;
00351     }
00352   else //mu_sur_Sc uniforme
00353     tab_mu_sur_Sc(0,0) = tab_mu(0,0) / Sc_;
00354 
00355   double temps_champ = mu->temps();
00356   mu_sur_Sc.valeur().changer_temps(temps_champ);
00357   tab_mu_sur_Sc.echange_espace_virtuel();
00358 }
